summary:
The Legendary SpiderMight Is Under Order From The Death Clan To
Build An Army Of Bandits And Take Over Whiterun.
You Must Stop Them Before That Happens!

Bandit Tavern Enrty Is Down A Secret Trapdoor In The Bannered Mare.
